properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE CATEGORY_ID = ? OR REF_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY_NAME , AUTHOR , EDITOR , PUBLICATION_DATE , PUBLISHER , SALE_PRICE , BOOK_IMG , STAR_SCORE FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID)) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
